articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Apple brings Apple Intelligence to the iPhone screen at WWDC 2025 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple said it's bringing Visual Intelligence, its AI-powered image analysis tech, to the iPhone screen in iOS 26.
articles.content:
Apple revealed at its WWDC 2025 event that it’s bringing Visual Intelligence, its AI-powered image analysis tech, to the iPhone screen in iOS 26.
Visual Intelligence will now make it easier and fast… [+1098 chars]
